title: [Large-scale] High-Fidelity Simulation-Based Team Nursing Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing skills and patient care procedure comprehension
context.additional_context: Provides a safe environment for practicing professionals to rehearse complex clinical scenarios.

learning_goals: Perform emergency response procedures for critical patients with 90% accuracy using high-fidelity simulators
Apply role distribution and communication strategies matched to real-world cases at 80% or higher through team-based learning
Analyze individual and team clinical decision-making processes using structured frameworks during reflection-based debriefing sessions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
